p:
Evaluation of in vitro anti-diabetic activity (α-amylase inhibition assay).
The α-amylase activity was measured using a colorimetric method with 3, 5-dinitrosalicylic acid (DNS) reagent. α-amylase (HiMedia, India) inhibition activity was measured using a standard protocol
16– 18 . The absorbance was measured at 540 nm. Acarbose (Sigma-Aldrich, USA) was used as a positive control. The experimental measurements were performed in triplicate.
